SEARCH
Package beans

Class PiggyBankBean

java.lang.Object
beans.PiggyBankBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named @SessionScoped public class PiggyBankBean extends Object implements Serializable
PiggyBankBean is a managed bean that handles operations related to the piggy bank feature. This includes adding funds to the piggy bank, withdrawing funds, setting and managing savings goals, and enforcing lock periods for funds in the piggy bank.
Author:
Arthur PHOMMACHANH - xphomma00
